name: affise-mcp-extension
description: Connect Claude to your Affise affiliate platform for advanced analytics and automation
long_description: This extension enables Claude to interact with your Affise affiliate marketing platform, providing access to offers, statistics, trafficback analysis, and more through natural language queries. Get insights, analyze performance, and automate your affiliate marketing workflows directly through Claude.

base_url.title: Affise Base URL
base_url.description: Your Affise API base URL (e.g., https://api-company.affise.com)

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Affise API key from account settings

tools.name: affise_status
tools.description: Check Affise configuration status and connection

tools.name: affise_search_offers
tools.description: Search and filter offers using natural language queries

tools.name: affise_stats
tools.description: Get comprehensive statistics and analytics with natural language

tools.name: affise_trafficback
tools.description: Analyze trafficback performance and optimization opportunities
